long_description: Built with soft, fleecy performance fabric and a fitted hood for extra warmth, the men's Salomon Swift hoodie will keep you on track during cold-weather workouts. Stretchy, warm fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, and its soft, fleecy interior will keep your spirits up during cold weather. Half-zip front allows quick ventilation and easy dressing. Thumbholes secures sleeves over wrists for warmth. Zippered chest pocket stashes small valuables. Reflective branding on front and back boosts visibility in dim light. The men's Salomon Swift hoodie features an active fit that's perfect for aerobic pursuits.
short_description: Built with soft, fleecy performance fabric and a fitted hood for extra warmth, the men's Salomon Swift hoodie will keep you on track during cold-weather workouts.
